Hero.title: Supporting children with guidance, trust, and space to grow
Hero.subtitle: SafeMentor helps families nurture curiosity, build trust, and support healthy development — with technology that respects childhood.

Values.title: SafeMentor is not another screen-time product
Values.description: It is a thinking and mentoring companion designed to help children develop curiosity, responsibility, emotional strength, and real-world connection — with strong support for parents.
Values.emphasis: Children don't need more apps. They need guidance, trust, and space to grow.
Values.citation: SafeMentor is built on internationally recognized child-development principles from Gerald Hüther, Jesper Juul, Dan Siegel, and principle-based thinking. We do not shape children through control. We invite development through relationship.

card1.title: Curiosity over pressure
card1.desc: Encouraging wonder and exploration, not performance metrics

card2.title: Connection over control
card2.desc: Development through relationship, not forced behavior

card3.title: Trust over surveillance
card3.desc: Insight for parents without invading children's privacy

learning.title: Learning & Understanding
learning.description: SafeMentor supports children with understanding school topics, exploring ideas and interests, and working through problems step by step.

callout.title: Important:
callout.desc1: SafeMentor does not give instant answers for homework.
callout.desc2: Instead, it asks guiding questions, helps children think step by step, and encourages their own ideas.

learning.emphasis: Because learning should activate the brain, not replace it.

offline.title: Offline Life Comes First
offline.description: SafeMentor actively encourages offline activities, creativity in the real world, and time with friends, family, and nature.
offline.emphasis: The best moments don't happen on a screen.

emotional.title: Emotional Support — Without Replacing Humans
emotional.description: SafeMentor listens when children want to talk. It can help children name emotions, encourage reflection, and suggest healthy next steps.

callout.title: But it is not a therapist

emotional.final: When needed, SafeMentor gently encourages talking to parents, talking to trusted adults, and seeking real human support.

safety.title: Safety & Early Warning
safety.description: SafeMentor looks for patterns, not secrets.

detect.title: What We Detect
list: Serious red flags: self-harm, grooming, bullying, drugs, harm to others

protects.title: This Protects Trust
protects.desc: Between child and parent. Children need to know they can express themselves safely, while parents stay informed about their wellbeing.

Approach.title: Technology that knows when to step back
Approach.description: SafeMentor is designed to support children's natural curiosity and emotional growth — then gently guide them back to real-world experiences, conversations, and play.

bullet1.title: Encourages offline exploration
bullet1.desc: Suggests activities, conversations, and experiences that happen away from screens.

bullet2.title: Keeps parents informed
bullet2.desc: Clear, honest communication about what your child is learning and experiencing.

Families.title: Supporting Parents — Not Judging Them
Families.description: SafeMentor exists to support parents, not replace them.

receives.title: Parents receive:
list: Context for what signals mean — and what they don't
Suggestions for how to talk to their child
Encouragement to build trust and connection
receives.emphasis: We never shame parents. We help them grow together with their child.

trust.title: Built on Trust
list: Trust is more powerful than control
trust.final: SafeMentor is designed to disappear when it's no longer needed.
trust.emphasis: Because success means: A child who thinks, feels, connects — and lives fully offline.

Quote.text: "SafeMentor helped our family have conversations we didn't know how to start. It's not about the technology — it's about bringing us closer together."
Quote.author: Maria K.

CTA.title: Ready to learn how SafeMentor works?
CTA.subtitle: Discover a calmer, more thoughtful approach to technology for your family.
CTA.disclaimer: No commitment required. Just thoughtful information.

Footer.text: Technology that respects childhood. Built with care, guided by ethics, focused on what matters most.
Footer.bottom: Made with care for children and families.
